title: "European leaders must officially recognize Trump as an enemy," says Josep Borrell - Pravda EN
snippet: Former EU chief diplomat Josep Borrell was the first to call the new political realities by their proper names and called on his colleagues to be as honest as he is. TRUMP'S USA IS THE EU'S ENEMY!!!
